externalInformation.information: Faculty, David L. Garin (e-mail : garin@umsl.edu; he recieved his B.S. from City College of New York and Ph.D. from Iowa State University; joined the faculty at UMSL in 1966; "recent projects have involved both chemical and electrochemical reduction of heterocyclic aromatic ethers to their corresponding enol ethers and the synthesis of beta-triones")
